description:
Grand Blues!, the official 4-koma manga for Cygames`s Granblue Fantasy, gets a short anime adaptation!
Set in the grand blue skies up above, the depths of darkness, elder sisters, knights, gentlemen, Vyrn lovers - all the colorful crew members will get to shine in a whole new light!
"Kept you waiting, huh? It`s time for you to see our final forms!"
Join us and take flight to the world in the skies!
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
The crew heads out on a monster hunting quest, and Lyria and Vyrn must come together to fight off the enemy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grand Blue no Sora de
In These Grand Blue Skies
グランブルーの空で

REGULAR.description:
Vyrn kills some time, Jeanne receives an invitation, Hallessena spots an unusual training method, and Rackam sees something he`d rather forget.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bii no Himatsubushi / Bii-kun Aikouka no Tsudoi / Nuigurumi / Takigyou no Kai

REGULAR.description:
Lily and the gunsmith sisters take center stage this episode.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
The Heave-Ho Trio star in this episode, as they contend with the Revenge of the Bonito.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Lunalu has a deadline to meet and enlists the help of the crew to make it. Will she be able to finish in time, and will she manage to sell any copies?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cain Gives the Orders / Midnight Billiards / The Potential Customer
Shiki Suru Cain / Mayonaka no Billiard / Mou Hitori no Kyaku

REGULAR.description:
Rosetta has joined the maidens of Xochitl for a concert!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakihokoru Rikka
Six Flowers of Fate
咲き誇る六花

REGULAR.description:
Narmaya and the rest of the big sister gang come together to have discussions, heal one of their own, and even perform a conversion ritual!
Source: Crunchyroll

The knights have arrived! But walls stand in their way...
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
The members of the Society, Zeta, Vaseraga, Beatrix, and Eustace are the focus of this episode.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Owen, Morphe, and Phoebe look into Grea and Lecia`s dreams, only to find their imagination running wild!
Source: crunchyroll

The primarchs take the spotlight as the crew approaches the climactic moments of 000.

Vyrn wakes up in an interdimensional pocket, where another Vyrn appears as a challenger!
Source: crunchyroll
